newsitem.title: USA: Fannie Mae Aug mortgage portfolio margin up.
newsitem.headline: Fannie Mae Aug mortgage portfolio margin up.

text.p: The Federal National Mortgage Association said Thursday the net interest margin on its mortgage portfolio rose two basis points in August to 130 basis points for an average balance of $272.92 billion.
The total net interest margin also rose two basis points, to 118 points, reflecting the rise in the mortgage portfolio net margin, Fannie Mae said in a monthly summary.
Fannie Mae's net mortgage portfolio grew $2.7 billion in August to $274.2 billion, an annualized growth rate of 11.8 percent, up from 10.6 percent in July.
